channel.title: Private chat makes crash?
channel.description:
hey there, I am using Allstar scape as a source and moparscape web client as client, what happens much is when ppl PM me, nothing is wrong but when i pm them they logg off, i would like to disable the private chat but don't know how :( thanks
BTW, a fix for the problem is even better ;)

item.title: Private chat makes crash?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Why don’t you people get back on-topic? First off, Delta does suck. It sucks horribly. I’m with 'Rich here. All-star and similar sources aren’t the best either, but at least niek is someone who doesn’t use the same base as everyone else. Everyone thinks Delta is great because range and fight caves and everything else is already programmed for them. Really, if you took the time to learn how to program you could easily make the same thing yourself.

@Topic: I’ve seen this problem before, and it might be something with the crowns. Try a different client first, otherwise it’s obviously something with the chat methods

Read full topic

item.title: Private chat makes crash?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote="`ExiledScape, post:12, topic:279593"][quote author=georges link=topic=368969.msg2794518#msg2794518 date=1242986361]

I say Richscape. Stable as fuck

While it may be ‘stable’ for the base it was edited from, it’s still shit and poorly programmed.

k listen kid ,

what source do u like THEN?
CZAR?!? u can’t even pk there omg ,
deltascape we like that because FULL PKING (most of sources)
Not so manny bugs etc…

So say what source u like cmon say?

Czar if its tht , thts the shittest! one

Georgio
[/quote]

Hes a kid? Lmfao

First off, Learn some grammar.

Secondly, You must be a fucking stupid coder. If you can’t make pking work on a source than you fucking fail…
You realize that you could make the source better, Like many others did?

You turn to deltascape cause it has full pking?
How about turning to a server like czar and actually coding things for yourself, idiot.

If you havn’t seen `Rich’s source, Go look at it. It owns all your crappy shit. Hes a far better coder than you will ever be.

Before you try flaming, Please look into your assumptions.[/quote]

Wahahah this is fun , First of all
i know i can’t speak tht good English k …
For now , i didnt said Richscape source is bad? cuz i used it b4…
I like Deltascapes cuz its easier coding than all other sources …
And Deltascapes i never get bored of them Thts it stop complain now n close the discussion…

Georgio im sorry if i did anythign wrogn , but Rich started xD!
